p: Although IFN-α expression was not elicited by RG-AIV infections in DF1 cells relative to mock infection, it was significantly induced in chickens infected by NS1031. Furthermore, IFN-β and TNF-α were highly expressed in NS1031-infected chicken lungs at 6 hpi ( Figure 5A), but this elevation of cytokine expression was diminished by 12 hpi ( Figure 5B).
